summary:
A pretty skimpy, rubbery, outfit for the CBBE curvy body and it comes with a
good amount of different boots, gloves and body options.
With colors in Blue, Black and White allowing for some mixing based on
personal taste.
descriptionHtml:
After a request from ermitaBoy that coincidentally was more or less the same
thing that I wanted to create, inspired by outfits worn by Psylocke, Kitana,
Cammy, Elektra and many similar of all the heroines we know well.
The result is what you see here.

A pretty skimpy, rubbery, outfit for the CBBE curvy body and it comes with a
good amount of different boots, gloves and body options.
With colors in Blue, Black and White allowing for some mixing based on
personal taste.

While I have made the actual model and textures, ermitaBoy have provided
suggestions, screenshots and loads of testing to get everything right.
Many thanks for that invaluable information and feedback.

Technically this is by far my best model yet, technically,
but texturing is still something I need to work with.

UPDATE:
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
The new esp file have HDT HH implemented.
It should not cause any issues, however, if you allready have this mod installed
and used with a save, HDT HH (scripts) may not activate.
Reason is most likely because the game saves the objects, if they are used, to
the actual savegame and not loaded from resources.

Either wait and hope that it solves itself or remove the old mod, make a new
save and then load the "new" mod.
This cleans the inventory of items but may reside inside the save anyway.

(This is the new version, old version still available).


UPDATE2:
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Do you wish to use other bodymodels you can try this, converted by gutris1:
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/66790/?]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/66790/?[/url]


Important notes:
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Based off the CBBE v3 body [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/2666/?]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/2666/?[/url]

Weight 0 and 1 support but no bounce or extra bones support.

Not lore friendly (If you don't like it, don't use it) !
Not realistic (it is not supposed to be either).

For the heeled boots you need SKSE, SkyUI and HDT HH system.
SKSE: [url=http://skse.silverlock.org/]http://skse.silverlock.org/[/url]
SkyUI: [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/3863/?]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/3863/?[/url]
HDT HH: [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/36213/?]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/36213/?[/url]
The boots don't have HDT HH implemented, use custom options instead.
(Set height for the heels to 5.5 and for the stiletto to 8.5, or close to it).
(You can now download a version with this implemented).

You can create all items and are under the leather category.

Helmet is classified as circlet and will thus void the perks that depend on
full sets (unless you use mods that fix that).

Mask (headgear) can and most likely will clip for some head types.
Impossible to make look good and work for all head combinations.

You might find that some items might clip a little in "ackward" positions.

If you wish to edit or change anything with the creationkit all my items
are named BBD... and is located under Armor/Addon and Constructible Objects.

I have not made a list of all the item ID's but type: help "sao" 0
to get a complete list in game.


Video review by vatiwah:
[youtube]OyIf7_ZO0sY[/youtube]

================================================================================
Installation
================================================================================
Copy the BBD_SAO.esp and BBD_SAO.bsa and place them in the Skyrim data folder.
(C:\Program Files\Steam\SteamApps\common\Skyrim\data)
Make sure it is selected during load.
